channel.title: r on Simo Ahava's blog
channel.description: Recent content in r on Simo Ahava's blog

item.title: Join Google Ads And GA4 Data In Google BigQuery
item.description: I am fortunate to share another guest post by Arben Kqiku, Digital Analyts at Assura. Last time, Arben graced this blog with a comprehensive love letter to R as an example of the power of this programming language. This time, he’ll add even more fancy tools to the toolkit to help you build a data pipeline in the Google Cloud Platform to join your Google Ads and Google Analytics 4 data together.

item.title: DIY Google Ads Account Monitor With R, AdWords API, And Slack API
item.description: Every now and then I’m fortunate enough to be able to publish guest posts by illustrious people in the analytics and digital marketing industries. This time, I get to work with an old colleague of mine who’s a veritable wizard when it comes to building solutions that make our daily work in the digital industry so much smoother. Erik Gr√∂nroos works as an analyst in MarkkinointiAkatemia, a Finnish digital customer acquisition agency.
